response.job_title: Account Manager | Commercial Engineer | Chemical Engineer | Sales Specialist | Head of sales | Business Development | Tech, Data, Software Passionate | Sales of raw materials, equipments, lubricants and adhesives
response.summary:
Commercial Engineer with more than 3 years of B2B & B2C experience with technical and consultative approach, passionate about the IT and tech sector. With experience in: IT headhunter account manager, new business opening, creation and implementation of commercial strategies, prospecting new customers and meeting sales targets, commercial engineering in industrial maintenance, creation of perfumes for cosmetic and grooming industries, management of undisciplined work groups and use of interpersonal relationships. Skills acquired by continuously advising clients from different industries in the IT and manufacturing sector, services and technology in consultative aspects of process, KPI's compliance, sales cycles, negotiation, invoicing, portfolio collection, import and export logistics.  

Finally, I consider that my greatest strength is my service attitude, a necessary skill to develop any kind of work in any area of knowledge.
response.skills: SAP CRM, Proceso de ventas, Gestión de cartera de clientes, Oracle CRM, Prospección de ventas, Estrategias de mercado, Consultoría, Retención de clientes, Gestión de relaciones con clientes (CRM), Zoho, Gestión de servicios de TI, Inglés como lengua extranjera, Negociación, Fidelización de clientes, Trabajo en equipo, Desarrollo de oportunidades de negocio, Liderazgo de equipos multidisciplinarios, Gerencia y gestión de proyectos, Habilidades comunicativas con muy buenas relaciones interpersonales., Alto nivel de compromiso

profile_positions.description:
Conduct targeted cold prospecting and comprehensive account management for IT client portfolio. Utilize CRM-driven KPIs to drive client acquisition and satisfaction. Apply advanced AI tools to streamline processes and develop effective IT market strategies. Collaborate cross-functionally to maximize revenue growth. Deliver personalized attention to client needs, fostering strong partnerships and achieving objectives.

Business executive IT headhunter: Planning and execution of the B2B sales cycle, USA and Canada segment.
Achievement of monthly sales targets and reporting.
Responsible for exhibit recruitment cycle for medium and high-level roles.
Present data and analysis related to clients' talent for decision-making.
Contribute to the establishment and development of corporate and business policies and procedures in conjunction with senior leadership.
Creation and implementation of commercial and marketing strategies for IT and non-IT customer loyalty. 
Opening new business.
Worked to maintain strong working relationships with each of my client's Human Resources staff, resulting in positive and productive collaborations.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for project development and sales management in B2B industrial maintenance, lubricants, and adhesives. Achieved industry approvals and conducted application testing to meet KPIs. Provided expert guidance on maintenance optimization and lubrication strategies. Managed CRM system for customer records and data analysis. Proactively managed portfolios and segmented customers to strengthen relationships. Delivered outstanding after-sales support to ensure high customer satisfaction. Actively pursued new business opportunities for sustainable growth.
Management / Development of projects and B2B technical sales focused on industrial maintenance: Greases, assembly pastes, oils, dry lubricants, galvanizers, galvanizing agents, locking agents, OKS release agents; which allow to increase equipment protection and optimize its performance.
profile_positions.title: Technical sales Engineering and maintenance - OKS spezialschmierstoffe

profile_positions.description:
Responsibility for customer acquisition in the Pharma, Biopharma, and Oil & Gas sectors. Execution of technical sales for consumables, spare parts, and maintenance services of analytical instrumentation equipment, such as HPLC chromatography, GC, MS, FTIR, spectroscopy, and sample preparation. Achievement of customer acquisition targets, leading to substantial sales growth.

Sales Consultant Customer Service Unit After-sales, Chromatography, Spectroscopy, Chemical Analysis, Consulting, Solutions, Analytical Techniques

Parts, Equipment, Analysis, Consumables, Training and Technical Support; for FTIR spectrometry, UV-VIS, chromatography (GC, HPLC, GC/MSD, HPLC/MSD, QQQ, TOF, QTOF), columns, spectroscopy, sample preparation, electrophoresis, and others.
profile_positions.title: Asesora Comercial UAC - Posventa

profile_positions.description:
Developed and executed strategic initiatives to fortify B2B and B2C commercial relationships, both with prospective and current clients, by employing technical expertise in the procurement of supplies and equipment, focusing on the Oil & Gas sector. Implemented meticulous value chain tracking to identify areas for enhancement and drive operational efficiency, resulting in measurable improvements and enhanced customer satisfaction.

Strengthening of new and existing B2B & B2C commercial relationships through technical management for the purchase of supplies and equipment specifically for the oil & gas sector. Performing the traceability of the value chain associated with the commercial process.
profile_positions.title: Asesora Comercial

profile_positions.description: Development of olfactory profiles, execution of sensory evaluations, and identification of effective technologies for the personal care and cosmetics sectors within the perfume creation laboratory. Collaboration with interdisciplinary teams and provision of expertise in product development and innovation.
profile_positions.title: Creation Trainee, Perfumery

profile_positions.description:
